EmailTemplate.description: Email to be used for quarterly opportunity cleanup exercise.
EmailTemplate.name: Oppty Cleanup Exercise
EmailTemplate.subject: ACTION: SFDC Opportunity Clean Up STARTS TODAY
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
SFDC Users:
The quarterly Salesforce.com opportunity clean-up starts today and will continue through July 12th.
YOUR ACTION: Clean out all your SFDC opportunity bad data by following the instructions below. Also remember to add all known opportunities to SFDC, including future quarter pipeline!
Step 1: Navigate to the Reports tab in SFDC and click on "SFDC CLEAN UP PROJECT" Folder on the left Step 2: Review each report and remove all bad data by following the instructions below
Report and Action Current Quarter Mgmt Call Oppty with NO Quote REP: Create a quote for all in quarter opportunities, specifically Mgmt Call deals Opportunities with Close Date Past Due REP: Update close date to future or mark as Closed Lost Opportunities Not Modified in 30 Days REP: Update or close Opportunities with NO Product REP: Add the appropriate product(s) Current Quarter Oppty in "Pipeline" Status REP: Update close date or forecast status Opportunities Owned by Deactivated User MGR: Reassign to an active user Opportunities with Non-Rep Owner SUPPORT RESOURCE: Reassign to a sales rep
Please note that any open opportunities with close dates in the past will be Closed Lost after this cleanup if the close date is not updated.
We appreciate your assistance as we continue to make Salesforce, and the data that lives there, more accurate for us to leverage as a company.
Thank you, Chris Braney
